caption.p: Influenza complicated by pneumonia. ( a) Chest X-ray demonstrates thickened pulmonary markings and wedge-shaped consolidation shadow extending outward from the hilum in both upper lung fields. ( bâ€“ c) CT scanning demonstrates wedge-shaped consolidation shadow in both upper lung lobes, with internal air bronchogram that is more obvious in the right lung, as well as small patches of blurry shadows in the right upper lung lobe
